page.title: 08CARSPHAIRN POST OFFICE
page.content: The post office has been in four different places over the years. The present postmistress has run it since 1968.It opens for business each day at 9 o'clock and closes at 5.30pm.On Thursday and Saturday the post office is open only in the morning.On Sunday it does not open at all.Stamps and other supplies are sent from the Head Office in Dumfries. The busiest day of the week is Thursday, because that is pension day. The busiest time of year is before Christmas.There is one delivery and one collection of mail each day.There is a danger that the post office in our village may close because not many people use it.
